snippet: A "Black Friday" shopping spree pushed British retail sales growth to a three-month high in November as shoppers splashed out on household goods and furniture, according to an industry survey on Tuesday....

headline.print_headline: 'Black Friday' Discounts Boost Retail Sales in November-BRC
headline.main: 'Black Friday' Discounts Boost Retail Sales in November-BRC

lead_paragraph: A "Black Friday" shopping spree pushed British retail sales growth to a three-month high in November as shoppers splashed out on household goods and furniture, according to an industry survey on Tuesday.
